properties.name: Police Stumble Upon Rodreick's Ruse
properties.description: Posted by Pace120 South Rock Island Avenue, El Reno, OK 73036El Reno, Okla, police investigators are informed Roreick\'s rented computer has more than 1,000 images of child porn. In their investigation, they learn he\'s been posing as a school boy.

properties.name: Rodreick Commits First Offense
properties.description: Posted by Pace110 East 2nd Street, Hennessey, OK 73742 Rodreick was arrested at age 18 on Chickasaw, Okla., for making lewd and indecent proposals to two six-year-old boys. He was sentenced to 10 years in prison.

properties.name: Rodreick's Lewd Layover in California
properties.description: Posted by Pace300 N. "D" Street, San Bernardino, CA 92418After serving seven years in prison, he was released to the home of an aunt in San Bernardino County, CA. She soon ran him off after discovering child porn on her home computer.
